title: Ilana Glazer
description: Samantha Bee talks to Broad City star Ilana Glazer about the need to do comedy, understanding the political system, and dancing with former AG Eric Holder. Apparently he's got some real dance moves...
author: fullrelease@sambee.com (Samantha Bee)
